select x.*,decode(y.matest,null,0,y.matest) matest,decode(z.spctst,null,0,z.spctst) spctst from ( select b.sampno,b.sampnm,b.sampnm1,b.spstat,b.suitty,b.photno,b.abstat,c.name as rgsp,b.rgdt,d.name as lmsp,b.lmdt, a.plspno,a.plspnm,a.ormtno,a.bradno,a.spyear,a.spsean,a.spbseno,a.sprseno,a.spclno,a.sptyno,a.spseno,a.splcno ,a.spbano,a.spftpr,a.sprtpr,a.spplrd,a.plctpr,a.pldate,a.mldate,a.plstat,a.plspst from ord_sample_plan a,ord_sample_design b ,t_user c,t_user d where a.plspno=b.plspno and b.rgsp=c.loginname and b.lmsp=d.loginname and exists ( select 1 from t_role_user x,t_role_class y where x.role_id=y.role_id and a.spclno=y.itno and x.user_id=#{user_id} ) and exists ( select 1 from t_role_user x,t_role_brand y where x.role_id=y.role_id and a.bradno=y.itno and x.user_id=#{user_id} )
) x left join (select distinct sampno,matest from ord_sample_mate) y on x.sampno=y.sampno left join ord_sample_colth z on x.sampno=z.sampno order by x.sampno
